text: Sano petaka pana ipande yagundana (nambo yajila yakwe yakulekangana), ni (mwana soni) migunda ja zabibu ni mimela (jine), kwisa soni mitende jana mapanda ni jangali mapanda; (nambo yoseyo) ikwitilidwa ni mesi gampepe (gakulandana), ni tukuitenda ine kuŵa yambone nnope kuipunda ine mu kanonye. Chisimu mu yalakweyi mwana ilosyo kwa ŵandu ŵaakwete lunda
